com.verilion.utility.html.parser
Class HTMLTokenizer

java.lang.Object
  com.verilion.utility.html.parser.HTMLTokenizer

public class HTMLTokenizer
extends java.lang.Object

This class tokenizes a stream of HTML tags and blocks of text. After the stream has been tokenized an Enumeration of tokens can be accessed.

See Also:
TagToken, TextToken, Enumeration

processBuffer

private java.lang.StringBuffer processBuffer(char[] charbuf,
                                             java.lang.StringBuffer old,
                                             int len)
Processes the given character array. The token buffer will be updated to start with the contents of the given StringBuffer. Any leftover parts of the buffer that have not been processed are returned in a StringBuffer. The next call to processBuffer will start where the last one left off by putting the returned StringBuffer in the argument list of the next call.

Parameters:
charbuf - the character array to be processed.
old - the leftovers from the last call.
len - the maximum length of the array to process.

indexOf

private int indexOf(char c,
                    char[] array,
                    int start,
                    int len)
Returns the index of the given character in the given byte array or -1 if the character does not appear there.

Parameters:
c - the test character.
array - the byte array to search.
start - the first index to search.
len - the maximum length to search.
